thread.title: Giants lose to Dodgers — Jeremy Affeldt, Tim Hudson say goodbye
thread.title_full: Giants lose to Dodgers — Jeremy Affeldt, Tim Hudson say goodbye - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John Shea
title: Giants lose to Dodgers — Jeremy Affeldt, Tim Hudson say goodbye
text:
Photo: Ezra Shaw, Getty Images Tim Hudson (left) waves to the crowd after throwing his final major-league pitch in the third inning Thursday. Tim Hudson (left) waves to the crowd after throwing his final...
The Giants’ fans weren’t saying goodbye just to Tim Hudson in the third inning on an emotional Thursday in China Basin. They were saying goodbye to a generation, maybe an era. Tim Hudson (left) waves to the crowd after throwing his final major-league pitch in the third inning Thursday. Tim Hudson (left) waves to the crowd after throwing his final...
The Giants’ fans weren’t saying goodbye just to Tim Hudson in the third inning on an emotional Thursday in China Basin. They were saying goodbye to a generation, maybe an era.
